entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 6:14 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:14 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
